channel.title: Little help
channel.description: I need a little help with my exprate command...it's different then the one you're thinking probably because all users can use it, and i already made all the checks but i'm only just starting with java so if someone could just help me a little with the coding (i already have the checks and text output made) i just don't know how to change the incExp "amount *=whatever" by using the command...i tried a bunch of stuff so if anyone knows if you could please help i'm not looking for any C&P nub tut or anything just some help from someone who knows more about java.

item.title: Little help
item.dc:creator: @Spyke8x Spyke8x
item.description:
@Spyke8x wrote:

not anything like swags lol (my server is private not public) i want it for my server because it works well i dunno what else to say plz someone who can help reply
(demonik source is horrid anyways)
